channel.title: Safety Information on 3D Visualization System for Ophthalmic Surgery
channel.description: Recent content in Safety Information on 3D Visualization System for Ophthalmic Surgery

item.title: General Warnings and Precautions
item.description: A warning statement is written to protect individuals from bodily harm. A caution statement is written to protect the instrument from damage. This section is for general system warnings and precautions only. WARNING Use of accessories other than those provided may affect system performance and create potential hazards. If it is determined that an accessory not provided by the Company has contributed to the malfunction of the equipment during the warranty period, service will be provided at prevailing hourly rates.

item.title: Label Locations
item.description: Note the safety and system label locations. Refer to the system for specific information. 1 Moving parts warning label – Includes a warning related to a protective guard. 2 Identifies compatible connectors. – The location and connector type varies with the display model. 3 Oculars storage warning label – Includes information about storing the microscope oculars. 4 Product label – Includes information about the system. 5 Wireless label – Indicates wireless capabilities.

item.title: Serious incident Reporting
item.description: Report any serious incident related to the system to the Company. In the EU, also report serious incidents to the competent authority for medical devices for the member state. Website: www.____.com
